name: Scribus
description: Scribus is a digital magazine generator. It can be used to make personal files, mailing list, digital document in digital magazine type. It has flexible layout and typesetting, professional grade images, and can create animation and export PDF.

en_US.description: Scribus is a digital magazine generator. It can be used to make personal files, mailing list, digital document in digital magazine type. It has flexible layout and typesetting, professional grade images, and can create animation and export PDF.
en_US.name: Scribus

zh_CN.description: Scribus是一款电子杂志制作软件，可以用来制作个人文件、邮件列表、电子杂志类型的电子文档，具有编写档案专业品质图像设置设备的能力，还可以创建动画和互动的PDF图像和形式。
zh_CN.name: Scribus
